# Plots with ggplot2

```{r calls, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
```

```{r read, echo=FALSE}
ca_np <- read.csv(here("data", "ca_np.csv"))
ci_np <- read_excel(here("data", "ci_np.xlsx"))
```

```{r line plot}
ggplot(data = ci_np, aes(x=year, y=visitors))+
  geom_line()
```

```{r store base plot}
gg_base <- ggplot(data = ci_np, aes(x=year,y=visitors))
```

```{r scatter plot}
gg_base +
  geom_point()
```

```{r column plot}
gg_base+
  geom_col()
```

```{r area plot}
gg_base +
  geom_area()
```

```{r line plot viz}
gg_base +
  geom_line(
    color = "purple",
    linetype = "dashed"
  )
```

```{r scatter plot viz}
gg_base + 
  geom_point(
    color = "purple",
    pch = 17,
    size = 4,
    alpha = 0.5
  )
```

```{r column plot viz}
gg_base +
  geom_col(
    color = "royalblue",
    fill = "skyblue",
    linetype = "solid",
    size = 0.5,
    alpha = 0.75,
  )
```

```{r scatter plot var viz}
gg_base +
  geom_point(
    aes(size = visitors,
    color = visitors),
    alpha = 0.5
  )
```

```{r column plot var viz}
gg_base +
  geom_col(
    aes(fill=visitors)
  )
```
